A young girl discovers she has the power to control the weather by drinking lemonade made from the oceans, which she uses to save the world from an impending climate disaster.
In a world where the oceans have turned into lemonade, a group of underwater creatures must navigate this strange new world and find a way to reverse the transformation before it's too late.

A group of scientists discover a way to harness the power of the lemonade oceans to create a sustainable source of energy, but they soon realize that their discovery has unintended consequences on the environment and the creatures that depend on it.

In a world where the oceans have turned into lemonade, a group of sailors must navigate the challenges of a new and unpredictable sea, while also dealing with the social and cultural changes that come with this transformation.
